sqlGroup.name: user
sqlGroup.sql: select user.id uuserid,user.username uaccount,user.providername uprovidername, user.email uemail,user.phone uphone,user.password upassword, user.hasher uhasher,user.salt usalt,user.avatar_url uavatatarurl, user.first_name ufirstname,user.last_name ulastname,user.full_name ufullname, user.created_at ucreatetime,user.updated_at uupdatetime,user.deleted_at udeletetime, userinfo.id info_id,userinfo.user_id info_userid,userinfo.branch_id info_branchid,userinfo.creator_id info_creatorid, userinfo.gender info_gender,userinfo.apartment_id info_apartmentid,userinfo.position_id info_positionid, userinfo.created_at info_createtime,userinfo.updated_at info_updatetime,userinfo.deleted_at info_deletetime, branch.id bid,branch.name bname,apartment.id aid,apartment.name aname,position.id pid,position.name pname, branch.created_at bcreatetime,branch.updated_at bupdatetime,branch.deleted_at bdeletetime

FROM sec_user_info AS userinfo LEFT OUTER JOIN com_branch AS branch on userinfo.branch_id=branch.id left outer join com_apartment as apartment on userinfo.apartment_id=apartment.id left outer join com_position as position on userinfo.position_id=position.id LEFT OUTER JOIN sec_user as user on userinfo.user_id=user.id where user.id=?

FROM sec_user_info AS userinfo LEFT OUTER JOIN com_branch AS branch on userinfo.branch_id=branch.id left outer join com_apartment as apartment on userinfo.apartment_id=apartment.id left outer join com_position as position on userinfo.position_id=position.id LEFT OUTER JOIN sec_user as user on userinfo.user_id=user.id
SELECT branch.id bid,branch.name bname,apartment.id aid,apartment.name aname,position.id pid,position.name pname

FROM sec_user_info AS userinfo LEFT OUTER JOIN sec_user AS user ON userinfo.user_id=user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN com_branch AS branch ON userinfo.branch_id=branch.id left outer join com_apartment as apartment on userinfo.apartment_id=apartment.id left outer join com_position as position on userinfo.position_id=position.id WHERE userinfo.user_id=?
SELECT user.id userid,user.email useremail,user.phone userphone, user.first_name firstname,user.last_name lastname,user.full_name fullname, branch.name bname,apartment.name aname,position.name pname

FROM sec_user_info AS userinfo LEFT OUTER JOIN com_branch AS branch ON userinfo.branch_id=branch.id LEFT OUTER JOIN com_apartment AS apartment ON userinfo.apartment_id=apartment.id LEFT OUTER JOIN com_position AS position ON userinfo.position_id=position.id LEFT OUTER JOIN sec_user AS user ON userinfo.user_id=user.id WHERE user.id in(SELECT usertype.user_id FROM com_user_type AS usertype WHERE usertype.type_id=?)
FROM sec_user AS user WHERE user.id =?

SELECT user.id userid,user.full_name fullname,userinfo.gender gender,branch.id bid,branch.name branch, apartment.id aid,apartment.name aname,position.id pid,position.name pname, user.deleted_at delete_at,user.remark remark

FROM sec_user_info AS userinfo LEFT OUTER JOIN sec_user AS user ON userinfo.user_id=user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN com_branch AS branch ON userinfo.branch_id=branch.id left outer join com_apartment as apartment on userinfo.apartment_id=apartment.id left outer join com_position as position on userinfo.position_id=position.id

sqlGroup.name: role
sqlGroup.sql: FROM sec_role `role` WHERE `role`.id IN (SELECT `userRole`.role_id FROM sec_user_role `userRole` WHERE `userRole`.user_id=?)
FROM sec_role `role` INNER JOIN (SELECT left_code,right_code FROM sec_role WHERE id=?) `code` ON (`role`.left_code > `code`.left_code AND `role`.right_code < `code`.right_code)

sqlGroup.name: userRole
sqlGroup.sql: select sur.id id, u.id userid,r.id roleid,r.name rname
from sec_user_role as sur left join sec_user as u on sur.user_id=u.id left join sec_role as r on sur.role_id=r.id where u.id=?

sqlGroup.name: permission
sqlGroup.sql: FROM sec_permission `permission` WHERE `permission`.id IN (SELECT `role_permission`.permission_id FROM sec_role_permission `role_permission` WHERE `role_permission`.role_id=?)
